verbose_text: Similarly, LOH of the MGMT locus and MGMT methylation were also more frequent in lesions from the patients with proximal / whole-colon SPP-FHP / CRC, in comparison with lesions from the patients with distal SPP-FHP / CRC [16/23 (70%) vs. 1/14 (7%), p = 2.2x10 -4; 19/29 (65%) vs. 7/17 (41%), p = 0.1, respectively] (XREF_TABLE).
